wesm commented on pull request #4617: ARROW-5652: [CI] Fix lint docker image
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4617#discussion_r295509965
 
 

 ##########
 File path: dev/lint/Dockerfile
 ##########
 @@ -25,7 +25,11 @@ RUN apt-get update && \
       clang-tidy-7 \
       clang-tools-7
 
-RUN conda install flake8 && \
+COPY ci/conda_env_gandiva.yml \
+     /arrow/ci/
+
+RUN conda install -q -c conda-forge \
+    --file arrow/ci/conda_env_gandiva.yml flake8 && \
 
 Review comment:
   This definitely reads weird (if I didn't know what was in conda_env_gandiva.yml I'd be scratching my head). Can we not get the linter dependencies from apt?
 
----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.
 
For queries about this service, please contact Infrastructure at:
users@infra.apache.org
